ðŸ“– Summary: Authelia is an open-source Single Sign-On (SSO) and multi-factor authentication (MFA) server. It protects web applications by requiring users to authenticate through its portal, supporting various 2FA methods like TOTP, WebAuthn, and push notifications, enhancing security for web services.
